PlayerDatabaseServer

It's a singleton class to be created at server.  Stores data about players.  Inherits from DoubleKeyHashmap.

Functions
set

Sets value associated with key0-key1 pair.

Parameters: _uid, _key, _value

_uid

String, Key 0, should be player's UID

_key

String, Key 1, should be name of a variable

_value

anything, the value to set

Returns: nil

get

Returns value associated with key0-key1 pair.

Parameters: _uid, _key

_uid

String, Key 0, should be player's UID

_key

String, Key 1, should be name of a variable

Returns: value
